content:
From: Livia Lestingi <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
International Symposium on Formal Methods
9-13 September 2024
Politecnico di Milano, Milan, Italy
https://www.fm24.polimi.it
Twitter/X : @FMsymp

CALL FOR PAPERS

FM 2024 is the 26th international symposium on Formal Methods in a
series organized by Formal Methods Europe (FME).

FM 2024 features regular papers, tutorial papers, an industry day, an
embedded systems track and more.

The conference proceedings will be published OPEN ACCESS by Springer in
the LNCS series, as part of the FM subline.

IMPORTANT LINKS

Research track (including Embedded Systems track):
https://www.fm24.polimi.it/?page_id=200

Tutorial Papers track:
https://www.fm24.polimi.it/?page_id=310

Industry Day track:
https://www.fm24.polimi.it/?page_id=402

Submission site:
https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=fm24

KEYNOTE SPEAKERS
https://www.fm24.polimi.it/?page_id=61

David Basin, ETH Zurich
Hadas Kress-Gazit, Cornell University
Marta Kwiatkowska, University of Oxford

IMPORTANT DATES

Abstract Submission: April 15th, 2024
Full Paper Submission: April 19th, 2024
Paper Notification: June 10th, 2024
Final Version: July 1st, 2024
Conference: September 9th-13th, 2024

ORGANIZERS:

  • General Chairs:

Matteo Pradella
Matteo Rossi

  • PC Chairs:

André Platzer
Kristin-Yvonne Rozier

  • Embedded Systems Track Chairs:

Wanli Chang
Alessandro Cimatti

  • Tutorial Papers Chairs:

Shriram Krishnamurthi
Luigia Petre

  • Industry Day Chairs:

Oksana Tkachuk
Tim Willemse

From: Livia Lestingi <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>

CALL FOR PAPERS

FM 2024 is the 26th international symposium on Formal Methods in a

FM 2024 features regular papers, tutorial papers, an industry day, an
embedded systems track and more.

The conference proceedings will be published OPEN ACCESS by Springer in
